text: Povl Dissing (27 January 1938 - 18 July 2022) was a Danish singer, composer, guitarist and harmonica player. He made his album debut with En aften i folkeklubben in 1965. He was known for his 1973 album with poet Benny Andersen. In 2006, "Svantes viser" was selected for the Danish Culture Canon. Dissing died on 18 July 2022 in Hundested, Denmark from a long-illness at the age of 84.Povl Dissing er død - 84 år ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Danish singers Category:Danish musicians Category:Danish composers Category:Guitarists
title: Povl Dissing
